high_descs: Walk forward to the bed and turn right towards the lamp on the desk.
Pick up the white pencil from the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: walk to the bed, turn right to face the small table
pick up the pencil that is on the table
anns.task_desc: examine the pencil with the lamp

high_descs: Head right at the bed and walk to the nightstand next to the bed.
Turn on the small lamp on the left side of the large wooden table next to the nightstand.
Pick up the white pencil from the right side of the small nightstand next to the bed.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a small lamp.
